DOC.brief_summary: This study will try to determine whether fetuses to mothers having clinical chorioamnionitis have changes in blood flow in middle cerebral artery.
DOC.brief_title: Changes in Blood Flow in MCA of Fetuses to Mothers Having Clinical Chorioamnionitis
DOC.detailed_description: This study will try to determine whether fetuses to mothers having clinical chorioamnionitis have changes in blood flow in middle cerebral artery. MCA flow parameters will be evaluated during labor of women with and wthout chorioamnionitis
DOC.criteria: women giving birth week 3742 healthy one fetus more than one fetus IUGR illness or damage to fetus
